quotes.quote: 42.7 percent of all statistics are made up on the spot.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: 99 percent of lawyers give the rest a bad name.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
A beautiful woman moved in next door. So I went over and returned a cup of
sugar. “You didn’t borrow this.” “I will.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: A clear conscience is usually the sign of a bad memory.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: A conclusion is the place where you got tired of thinking.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: A conscience is what hurts when all your other parts feel so good.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
A cop stopped me for speeding. He said, “Why were you going so fast?” I said,
“See this thing my foot is on? It’s called an accelerator. When you push down
on it, it sends more gas to the engine. The whole car just takes right off.
And see this thing? This steers it.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: A fool and his money are soon partying.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
A friend of mine once sent me a post card with a picture of the entire planet
Earth taken from space. On the back it said, “Wish you were here.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: A lot of people are afraid of heights. Not me, I’m afraid of widths.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: After they make Styrofoam, what do they ship it in?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
All of the people in my building are insane. The guy above me designs
synthetic hairballs for ceramic cats. The lady across the hall tried to rob a
department store...with a pricing gun. She said, “Give me all of the money in
the vault, or I’m marking down everything in the store.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
All the plants in my house are dead; I shot them last night.
I was teasing them by watering them with ice cubes.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: All those who believe in psychokinesis raise my hand.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Ambition is a poor excuse for not having enough sense to be lazy.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Bills travel through the mail at twice the speed of checks.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Borrow money from pessimists-they don’t expect it back.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Boycott shampoo! Demand the REAL poo!
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Change is inevitable ... except from vending machines.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Cross country skiing is great if you live in a small country.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Dancing is a perpendicular expression of a horizontal desire.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
Doing a little work around the house. I put fake brick wallpaper over a real
brick wall, just so I’d be the only one who knew. People come over and I’m
gonna say, “Go ahead, touch it...it feels real.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Droughts are because god didn’t pay his water bill.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Drugs may lead to nowhere, but at least it’s the scenic route.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Eagles may soar, but weasels don’t get sucked into jet engines.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Even snakes are afraid of snakes.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Ever notice how irons have a setting for *permanent* press? I don’t get it...
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
Every so often, I like to go to the window, look up, and smile for a
satellite picture.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Everyone has a photographic memory. Some just don’t have film.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Experience is something you don’t get until just after you need it.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
For a while I didn’t have a car...I had a helicopter...no place to park it, so
I just tied it to a lamp post and left it running...[slow glance upward]
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: For every action, there is an equal and opposite criticism.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
For my birthday I got a humidifier and a de-humidifier...
I put them in the same room and let them fight it out.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Half the people you know are below average.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Hard work pays off in the future. Laziness pays off now.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: How do you tell when you’re out of invisible ink?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: How many people does it take to change a searchlight bulb?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I almost had a psychic girlfriend but she left me before we met.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I bought a dog the other day...  I named him Stay.
It’s fun to call him...  “Come here, Stay!  Come here, Stay!”
He went insane.  Now he just ignores me and keeps typing.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I bought a house, on a one-way dead-end road. I don’t know how I got there.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I bought a million lottery tickets. I won a dollar.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I bought a self learning record to learn Spanish, 
I turned it on and went to sleep; the record got stuck.
The next day I could only stutter in Spanish.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I bought my brother some gift-wrap for Christmas.
I took and to the Gift Wrap department and told them to wrap it,
but in a different print so he would know when to stop unwrapping.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I bought some powdered water, but I don’t know what to add to it.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I brought a mirror to Lovers’ Lane. I told everybody I’m Narcissus.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I can remember the first time I had to go to sleep. Mom said, “Steven, time to
go to sleep.” I said, “But I don’t know how.” She said, “It’s real easy.
Just go down to the end of tired and hang a left.” So I went down to the end
of tired, and just out of curiosity I hung a right. My mother was there, and
she said “I thought I told you to go to sleep.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I can’t stop thinking like this.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I couldn’t find the remote control to the remote control.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I couldn’t repair your brakes, so I made your horn louder.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I didn’t get a toy train like the other kids.
I got a toy subway instead.
You couldn’t see anything,
but every now and then you’d hear this rumbling noise go by.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I don’t like the sound of my phone ringing so I put my phone inside my fish
tank. I can’t hear it, but every time I get a call I see the fish go like this
<<<>>><<>><<<<. I go down to the pet store -- “Gimme another ten guppies, I
got a lotta calls yesterday.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I eat swiss cheese from the inside out.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I eat swiss cheese. But I only nibble on it. I make the holes bigger.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I filled out an application that said, “In Case Of Emergency
Notify”.  I wrote “Doctor”...  What’s my mother going to do?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I got a chain letter by fax. It’s very simple. You just fax a dollar bill to
everybody on the list.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I got a garage door opener. It can’t close. Just open.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I got a new shadow. I had to get rid of the other one --  it wasn’t doing
what I was doing.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I got food poisoning today. I don’t know when I’ll use it.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I got my driver’s license photo taken out of focus on purpose.
Now when I get pulled over the cop looks at it
(moving it nearer and farther, trying to see it clearly) ... and says, “Here, you can go.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I got pulled over by a cop, and he said, “do you know the speed limit
here is 50 miles per hour?”. So I said, “oh, that’s OK, I’m not going
that far”.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I got up one morning and couldn’t find my socks, so I called Information. She
said, “Hello, Information.” I said, “I can’t find my socks.” She said,
“They’re behind the couch.” And they were!
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I had a friend who was a clown. When he died,
all his friends went to the funeral in one car.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I had amnesia once or twice.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I had fried octopus last night. You have to be really quiet when you eat it.
Otherwise, it emits a cloud of black smoke and falls on the floor.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I had just received my degree in Calcium Anthropology—the study of
milkmen.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I had my coat hangers spayed.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I had some eyeglasses. I was walking down the street when suddenly the
prescription ran out.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I had to stop driving my car for a while ... the tires got dizzy.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I hate it when my foot falls asleep during the day
because that means it’s going to be up all night.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I have a hobby...I have the world’s largest collection of sea shells.
I keep it scattered on beaches all over the world.  Maybe you’ve seen
some of it...
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I have a microwave fireplace in my house...The other night I laid down in front
of the fire for the evening in two minutes.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I have a switch in my apartment.  It doesn’t do anything.  Every
once in a while, I turn it on and off.  One day I got a call.
it was from a woman in France. She said “Cut it out”.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I have an answering machine in my car. It says, “I’m home now. But leave a
message and I’ll call when I’m out.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I have two very rare photographs.
One is a picture of Houdini locking his keys in his car.
The other is a rare photograph of Norman Rockwell beating up a child.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I hooked up my accelerator pedal in my car to my brake lights. I hit the gas,
people behind me stop, and I’m gone.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I installed a skylight in my apartment...
The people who live above me are furious!
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I intend to live forever - so far, so good.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I invented the cordless extension cord.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I know the guy who writes all those bumper stickers. He hates New York.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I like to go to art museums and name the untitled paintings...
Boy With Pail... Kitten On Fire.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I love to go shopping. I love to freak out salespeople. They ask me if they
can help me, and I say, “Have you got anything I’d like?” Then they ask me
what size I need, and I say, “Extra medium.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I made a chocolate cake with white chocolate. Then I took it to a potluck. I
stood in line for some cake. They said, “Do you want white cake or chocolate
cake?” I said, “yes”.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I made wine out of raisins so I wouldn’t have to wait for it to age.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I met this wonderful girl at Macy’s. She was buying clothes and I was putting
Slinkies on the escalator.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I mixed this glass of water myself.
Two parts H, one part O.
I don’t trust anybody!
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I moved into an all-electric house. I forgot and left the porch light on all
day. When I got home the front door wouldn’t open.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I planted some bird seed. A bird came up. Now I don’t know what to feed it.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I play the harmonica. The only way I can play is if I get my car going really
fast, and stick it out the window. I put a new engine in my car, but forgot to
take the old one out. Now my car goes 500 miles per hour. The harmonica
sounds *amazing*.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I plugged my phone in where the blender used to be. I called someone. They
went “Aaaaahhhh...”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I put contact lenses in my dog’s eyes. They had little pictures of cats on
them. Then I took one out and he ran around in circles.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I put hardwood floors on top of wall-to-wall carpet.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I put instant coffee in a microwave oven and almost went back in time.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I put my air conditioner in backwards. It got cold outside. The weatherman on
TV was confused. “It was supposed to be hot today.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I rented a lottery ticket. I won a million dollars. But I had to give it
back.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I replaced the headlights in my car with strobe lights,
so it looks like I’m the only one moving.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I saw a bank that said “24 Hour Banking”, but I don’t have that much time.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I saw a close friend of mine the other day... He said, “Steven, why haven’t
you called me?” I said, “I can’t call everyone I want. My new phone has no
five on it.” He said, “How long have you had it?” I said, “I don’t know...
my calendar has no sevens on it.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I saw a man with a wooden leg, and a real foot.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I saw a sign at a gas station.  It said “help wanted”.  There was
another sign below it that said “self service”.  So I hired
myself.  Then I made myself the boss.  I gave myself a raise.
I paid myself.  Then I quit.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I saw a sign: “Rest Area 25 Miles”. That’s pretty big. Some people must be
really tired.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I saw a small bottle of cologne and asked if it was for sale. She said, “It’s
free with purchase.” I asked her if anyone bought anything today.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I saw a subliminal advertising executive, but only for a second.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I spent all my money on a FAX machine.
Now I can only FAX collect.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I spilled Spot Remover on my dog. Now he’s gone.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I stayed up all night playing poker with tarot cards.
I got a full house and four people died.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I still have my Christmas Tree. I looked at it today. Sure enough, I couldn’t
see any forests.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I took a course in speed reading. Then I got Reader’s Digest on microfilm. By
the time I got the machine set up, I was done.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I took a course in speed waiting. Now I can wait an hour in only ten minutes.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I took lessons in bicycle riding. But I could only afford half of them. Now I
can ride a unicycle.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I used to have an open mind but my brains kept falling out.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I used to work in a fire hydrant factory.
You couldn’t park anywhere near the place.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I want to get a tattoo of myself on my entire body only 2” taller.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I was born by Caesarian section...but not so you’d notice. It’s just that when
I leave a house, I go out through the window.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I was going 70 miles an hour and got stopped by a cop who said, “Do you know
the speed limit is 55 miles per hour?” “Yes, officer, but I wasn’t going to be
out that long...”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I was going to tape some records onto a cassette, but I got the wires
backwards. I erased all of the records. When I returned them to my friend, he
said, “Hey, these records are all blank.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I was in a job interview and I opened a book and started reading. Then I said
to the guy, “Let me ask you a question. If you are in a spaceship that is
traveling at the speed of light, and you turn on the headlights, does anything
happen?” He said, “I don’t know.” I said, “I don’t want your job.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I was in the first submarine. Instead of a periscope, they had a kaleidoscope.
“We’re surrounded.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I was in the grocery store. I saw a sign that said “pet supplies”. So I did.
Then I went outside and saw a sign that said “compact cars”.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I was sad because I had no shoes, until I met a man who had no feet.
So I said, “Got any shoes you’re not using?”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I was trying to daydream, but my mind kept wandering.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I washed a sock. Then I put it in the dryer. When I took it out, it was gone.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I watched the Indy 500, and I was thinking that if they left earlier they
wouldn’t have to go so fast.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I wear my heart on my sleeve. I wear my liver on my pant leg.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I went camping and borrowed a circus tent by mistake. I didn’t notice until I
got it set up. People complained because they couldn’t see the lake.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I went down the street to the 24-hour grocery. When I got there, the guy was
locking the front door. I said, “Hey, the sign says you’re open 24 hours.” He
said, “Yes, but not in a row.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I went into this bar and sat down next to a pretty girl. She looked at me and
said, “Hey, you have two different colored socks on.” I said, “Yeah, I know,
but to me they’re the same because I go by thickness.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I went over to the neighbor’s and asked to borrow a cup of salt. “What are you
making?” “A salt lick.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I went to a 7-11 and asked for a 2x4 and a box of 3x5’s. The clerk said,
“ten-four.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I went to a fancy French restaurant called “Deja Vu.” The headwaiter said,
“Don’t I know you?”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I went to a garage sale. “How much for the garage?” “It’s not for sale.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I went to a general store. They wouldn’t let me buy anything specifically.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I went to a haunted house, looked under the kitchen table, and found spirit
gum.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I went to a restaurant that serves “breakfast at any time”.
So I ordered French Toast during the Renaissance.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I went to San Francisco. I found someone’s heart.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I went to the bank and asked to borrow a cup of money. They said, “What for?”
I said, “I’m going to buy some sugar.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I went to the eye doctor and found out I needed glasses for reading.  So,
I got some flip-up contact lenses.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I went to the hardware store and bought some used paint. It was in the shape
of a house. I also bought some batteries, but they weren’t included.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I went to the museum where they had all the heads and arms from the statues
that are in all the other museums.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I went to this restaurant last night that was set up like a big buffet in the
shape of an Ouija board. You’d think about what kind of food you want, and the
table would move across the floor to it.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I woke up this morning and couldn’t find my socks, so I called
information.  She said they were behind the couch.  She was right.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I worked in a health food store once. A guy came in and asked me, “If I melt
dry ice, can I take a bath without getting wet?”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I wrote a few children’s books ... not on purpose.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
I wrote a song, but I can’t read music so I don’t know what it is.
Every once in a while I’ll be listening to the radio and I say, “I think
I might have written that.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I xeroxed a mirror. Now I have an extra xerox machine.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I xeroxed my watch. Now I can give away free watches.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I xeroxed my watch. Now I have time to spare.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: If a word in the dictionary were misspelled, how would we know?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: If at first you don’t succeed, destroy all evidence that you tried.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: If at first you don’t succeed, then skydiving definitely isn’t for you.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: If Barbie is so popular, why do you have to buy her friends?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
If everything seems to be going well, you have obviously overlooked
something.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: If God dropped acid, would he see people?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
If toast always lands butter-side down, and cats always land on
their feet, what happen if you strap toast on the back of a cat
and drop it?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: If you can wave a fan, and you can wave a club, can you wave a fan club?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: If you can’t hear me, it’s because I’m in parentheses
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: If you had a million Shakespeares, could they write like a monkey?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
If you must choose between two evils, pick the one you’ve never tried
before.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: If you tell a joke in the forest, but nobody laughs, was it a joke?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: If you think nobody cares about you, try missing a couple of payments.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: If you were going to shoot a mime, would you use a silencer?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
If you write the word “monkey” a million times, do you start to think you’re
Shakespeare?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: If you’re not part of the solution, you’re part of the precipitate.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
In my house on the ceilings I have paintings of the rooms above...so I never
have to go upstairs.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
In my house there’s this light switch that doesn’t do anything. Every so often
I would flick it on and off just to check. Yesterday, I got a call from a
woman in Madagascar. She said, “Cut it out.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
In school, every period ends with a bell. Every sentence ends with a period.
Every crime ends with a sentence.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Is “tired old cliché” one?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: It only rains straight down. God doesn’t do windows.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: It’s a fine night to have an evening.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
It’s a good thing we have gravity or else when birds died they’d just
stay right up there.  Hunters would be all confused.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: It’s a small world, but I wouldn’t want to have to paint it.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I’d kill for a Nobel Peace Prize.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I’m moving to Mars next week, so if you have any boxes...
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I’m writing a book.  I’ve got the page numbers done.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Join the Army, meet interesting people, kill them.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Last week I forgot how to ride a bicycle.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
Last year I went fishing with Salvador Dali.
He was using a dotted line.
He caught every other fish.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
Last year we drove across the country. We switched on the driving...every half
mile...We had one cassette tape to listen to on the entire trip...I don’t
remember what it was.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Many people quit looking for work when they find a job.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Monday is an awful way to spend 1/7th of your life.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
My aunt gave me a walkie-talkie for my birthday. She says if I’m good, she’ll
give me the other one next year.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
My dental hygienist is cute. Every time I visit, I eat a whole package of Oreo
cookies while waiting in the lobby. Sometimes she has to cancel the rest of
the afternoon’s appointments.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
My friend has a baby.  I’m recording all the noises he makes
so later I can ask him what he meant.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
My friend Sally is a nudist. I went to her house. The closets have no doors.
The walls are covered with see-through wallpaper.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: My friend Sam has one leg. I went to his house. I couldn’t go up the stairs.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
My girlfriend does her nails with white-out. When she’s asleep,
I go over there and write misspelled words on them.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
My grandfather gave me a watch.
It doesn’t have any hands or numbers.
He says it’s very accurate.
I asked him what time it was.
You can guess what he told me.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
My grandfather invented Cliff’s Notes. It all started back in 1912...
well, to make a long story short...
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
My house is made out of balsa wood, so when I want to scare the neighborhood
kids I lift it over my head and tell them to get out of my yard or I’ll throw
it at them.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
My house is on the median strip of a highway. You don’t really notice, except
I have to leave the driveway doing 60 MPH.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: My neighbor has a circular driveway...he can’t get out.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
My roommate got a pet elephant. Then it got lost. It’s in the apartment
somewhere.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: My socks DO match. They’re the same thickness.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: My theory of evolution is that Darwin was adopted.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
Officer, I know I was going faster than 55MPH, but I wasn’t going to be on the
road an hour.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: OK, so what’s the speed of dark?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: On the other hand, you have different fingers.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
One night I walked home very late and fell asleep in somebody’s satellite dish.
My dreams were showing up on TV’s all over the world.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
One time a cop pulled me over for running a stop sign. He said, “Didn’t you
see the stop sign?” I said, “Yeah, but I don’t believe everything I read.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
One time the power went out in my house and I had to use the flash on my camera
to see my way around. I made a sandwich and took fifty pictures of my face.
The neighbors thought there was lightning in my house.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Plan to be spontaneous tomorrow.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
Right now I’m having amnesia and deja-vu at the same time.
I think I’ve forgotten this before.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Sally plays strip poker. Whenever she loses, she has to put something on.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Shin: a device for finding furniture in the dark.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Smoking cures weight problems ... eventually.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: So, do you live around here often?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
Someone sent me a postcard picture of the earth.
On the back it said, “Wish you were here.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
Sponges grow in the ocean. That just kills me. I wonder how much deeper the
ocean would be if that didn’t happen.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Support bacteria - they’re the only culture some people have.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: The Bermuda Triangle got tired of warm weather. It moved to Alaska. Now Santa Claus is missing.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: The colder the X-ray table, the more of your body is required to be on it.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: The early bird gets the worm, but the second mouse gets the cheese.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: The hardness of the butter is proportional to the softness of the bread.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
The judge asked, “What do you plead?” I said, “Insanity, your honour, who in
their right mind would park in the passing lane?”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
The other day, I was walking my dog around my building...on the ledge. Some
people are afraid of heights. Not me, I’m afraid of widths.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
The other night I came home late, and tried to unlock my house with my car
keys. I started the house up. So, I drove it around for a while. I was
speeding, and a cop pulled me over. He asked where I lived. I said, “right
here, officer”. Later, I parked it on the freeway, got out, and yelled at all
the cars, “Get out of my driveway!”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: The problem with the gene pool is that there is no lifeguard.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: The severity of the itch is proportional to the reach.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: The sign said “eight items or less”. So I changed my name to Les.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: The sky already fell. Now what?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: The sky is falling...no, I’m tipping over backwards.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: The sooner you fall behind, the more time you’ll have to catch up.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
The sun never sets on the British Empire. But it rises every morning. The sky
must get awfully crowded.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: There aren’t enough days in the weekend.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
There was a power outage at a department store yesterday. Twenty people were
trapped on the escalators.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
There’s a fine line between fishing and standing on the shore looking like an
idiot.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
There’s a pizza place near where I live that sells only slices;
in the back you can see a guy tossing a triangle in the air.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
They say we’re 98% water. We’re that close to drowning...
[picks up his glass of water from the stool]...
I like to live on the edge...
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Tinsel is really snakes’ mirrors.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: To steal ideas from one person is plagiarism; to steal from many is research.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
Today I dialed a wrong number... The other person said, “Hello?” and I said,
“Hello, could I speak to Joey?”... They said, “Uh... I don’t think so...
he’s only 2 months old.” I said, “I’ll wait.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
Two babies were born on the same day at the same hospital. They lay there and
looked at each other. Their families came and took them away. Eighty years
later, by a bizarre coincidence, they lay in the same hospital, on their
deathbeds, next to each other. One of them looked at the other and said, “So.
What did you think?”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: What are imitation rhinestones?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: What happens if you get scared half to death twice?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: What’s another word for Thesaurus?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: When everything is coming your way, you’re in the wrong lane.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
When he gets older, I’d tell him he used to have a brother,
but he didn’t obey.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
When I get bored I go to a Seven-Eleven and ask for a two-by-four and a box of
three-by-fives.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
When I get real bored, I like to drive downtown and get a great parking spot,
then sit in my car and count how many people ask me if I’m leaving.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
When I have a kid, I want to buy one of those strollers for twins.
Then put the kid in and run around, looking frantic.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
When I turned two I was really anxious, because I’d doubled my age in a year.
I thought, if this keeps up, by the time I’m six I’ll be ninety.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
When I was a little kid we had a sand box. It was a quicksand box.
I was an only child....eventually.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
When I was crossing the border into Canada, they asked if I had
any firearms with me.  I said, “Well, what do you need?”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
When I was in boy scouts, I slipped on the ice and hurt my ankle. A little old
lady had to help me across the street.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
When I was little, my grandfather used to make me stand in a closet for five
minutes without moving. He said it was elevator practice.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
When I woke up this morning my girlfriend asked me,
“Did you sleep good?” I said, “No, I made a few mistakes.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: When I’m not in my right mind, my left mind gets pretty crowded.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
While I was gone, somebody rearranged on the furniture in my
bedroom.  They put it in _exactly_ the same place it was.
When I told my roommate, he said: Do I know you?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Who is General Failure and why is he reading my hard disk?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Why do psychics have to ask you for your name?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Why is the alphabet in that order?  Is it because of that song?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
Winny and I lived in a house that ran on static electricity...If you wanted to
run the blender, you had to rub balloons on your head. If you wanted to cook,
you had to pull off a sweater real quick.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
Yesterday I found out what dough-nuts are for. You put them on dough-bolts.
They hold dough airplanes together. For kids, they make erector sets out of
play-dough.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
Yesterday I parked my car in a tow-away zone...
when I came back the entire area was missing.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
Yesterday I saw a chicken crossing the road. I asked it why. It told me it
was none of my business.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Yesterday I told a chicken to cross the road. It said, “what for?”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: You can’t have everything. Where would you put it?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
You know how it is when you decide to lie and say the check is in the mail,
and then you remember it really is? I’m like that all the time.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
You know how it is when you go to be the subject of a psychology experiment,
and nobody else shows up, and you think maybe that’s part of the experiment?
I’m like that all the time.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
You know how it is when you’re reading a book and falling asleep, you’re
reading, reading...and all of a sudden you notice your eyes are closed? I’m
like that all the time.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
You know how it is when you’re walking up the stairs, and you get to the top,
and you think there’s one more step? I’m like that all the time.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: You never really learn to swear until you learn to drive.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: “24-hour banking? I haven’t got time for that.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: “Did you sleep well?” “No, I made a couple of mistakes.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: “So, do you live around here often?”
quotes.author: Steven Wright
